Overvågning af den igangværende evalueringen af vævsdirektivet (DIR 2004/23/EC).

relevant_communication:
Møde med EU-kommissionen: https://ec.europa.eu/health/sites/health/files/blood_tissues_organs/docs/ev_20171026_sr_en.pdf 
 
Deltagelse i Public Evaluation:  http://ec.europa.eu/newsroom/sante/newsletter-specific-archive-issue.cfm?newsletter_service_id=327&newsletter_issue_id=5171&page=1&fullDate=Wed%2020%20Sep%202017&lang=default 
https://ec.europa.eu/health/sites/health/files/blood_tissues_organs/docs/ev_20170920_sr_en.pdf 
 
Deltagelse i møde med EU-kommissionen:  https://ec.europa.eu/health/sites/health/files/blood_tissues_organs/docs/ev_20171116_ag_en.pdf 
 
Deltagelse i ICF-meeting. 
  
Deltagelse ESHRE (Juli 2018). 
 
Indbragt sag for Implementeringsrådet vedrørende dansk overimplementering af vævsdirektivet, som fejlagtigt gør genetisk sygdom hos børn til ”alvorlig uønsket bivirkning” (Primo 2018).  
 
 
Høringssvar på udkast til bekendtgørelse om kvalitet og sikkerhed ved håndtering af humane væv og celler af 06-07-2018.  
 
Redegørelse til STPS med forslag til indholdsmæssige og strukturelle ændringer i lov om assisteret reproduktion og vævslovgivningen med henblik på at opnå en mere sammenhængende, overskuelig og praktisk anvendelig lovgivning, samt en bedre sikring af ensartede konkurrencevilkår for vævscentre i EU (August 2018) 
 
Notat til Sundhedsministeriet om hensigtsmæssigheden af en generel indførelse af Cryos’ CON-system og det heriboende vidensdelingsfremmende ”åbenheds/tranparensprincip” omkring konstaterede bærerstatusser for genetiske sygdomme hos kønscelledonorer fremfor det nuværende rapid alert-system, som er baseret på ”blokerings-princippet”, der har en hæmmende effekt på samhandel og åbenhed mellem de involverede stakeholders (September 2018)-
goals__remit:
Vision:  
To help childless make their dream come true. 
 
Mission: 
To provide high quality human sperm and eggs from selected and screened donors of all ethnicities and phenotypes. 
 
Values: 
Our values express our beliefs and culture. They outline the foundation for how we work in order to achieve our vision and mission. Furthermore, they define how we operate in relation to our customers, donors, and other interest groups, such as legislators and journalists.  
 
Help & Care is to...  
make our services easily accessible 
help our donors and customers through the decision process       
care about our donors’ and customers’ needs and wishes 
 
Safety & Professionalism is to...  
ensure high standards of quality and safety 
have an honest and thorough business approach 
focus on documented and traceable procedures 
 
Innovation & Development is to...  
allocate resources for innovation and research 
seek new challenges with an open mind 
cooperate and network internationally 
 
Ethics & Responsibility is to...  
believe in the donors’ and customers’ right to choose 
protect the interests of the donors and customers 
analyse and clarify ethical issues 
 
Cryos' goals: 
It is Cryos' aim to ensure a wide selection of high quality donor sperm from all races and ethnicities. It has always been a hallmark of Cryos to ensure the highest level of service. Furthermore, we will continue to carry and finally maintain and develop our professional knowledge and know-how in the field.  
 
The Cryos policy is to support scientific research and development related to sperm and male infertility.
